ygData.subject: Re: Kill Stealing
ygData.msgSnippet: This is unbelievable.. you are blaming other people for your kill stealing?! First off, this game is more than about powerlevling.  That s probably why you can
ygData.messageBody:
This is unbelievable.. you are blaming other people for your kill stealing?!
First off, this game is more than about powerlevling. That's probably why
you can never find a group. Maybe because you are so socially retarded that
you don't know how to communicate with people in groups. I rarely have
problems finding a group, and if i spend 30 mins or more and can't find a
group, i'm going to log and do something in RL for a change.
"IT IS BECAUSE WE CANNOT FIND GROUPS" wah, wah, poor baby. Suck it up,
you're a loser and nobody wants to group with you. Continue to KS. What do
i care? i'm beyond those lvls where it happens.


> You guys don't seem to understand why some of us (such as myself)
>kill
>steal all the time. IT IS BECAUSE WE CANNOT FIND GROUPS !!! simple as
>that.
>no groups, KS ! thats it. I don't feel like sitting on my ass for 30 - 40
>min
>waiting for ppl to group, while shouting all the time.
>
>1) people hate us for shouting so much
>2) people don't message us even if they need group member (weird)
>
> You ppl who are against kill stealers by shouting their names out so
>no one
>will group them are so god damn stupid, all you have to do is group with
>them
>and BINGO !! no more kill stealing. If i am getting good xp , why kill
>steal
>?? there is no point for me to risk my life trying to get xp from some
>monster
>6 others are beating up on. I rarely die in a group since I stand so far
>back,
>but while kill stealing if i beat them up too much, the mob might run to me
>with
>no one else helping. If you really want to stop kill stealing, then just
>group
>with those people so you guys can take on higher mobs together. I would
>happily stop KS anytime during the day to Group with ppl passing by. I
>only KS
>while waiting for groups and i do shout for groups while i KS as well.
>People are stupid and don't know how to stop a problem, oh well... what
>can you
>do ?
>
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>ONElist: where real people with real interests get connected.
>http://www.onelist.com
>Join a new list today!
